author: NBC News
title: U.S. deaths top 12,000 as New York City suffers deadliest day
description: The U.S. recorded more than 1,200 coronavirus deaths in 24 hours, while Prime Minister Boris Johnson was taken into intensive care as he battles coronavirus.
content:
CDC removes unusual guidance to doctors about drug favored by Trump
The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has removed from its website highly unusual guidance informing doctors on how to prescribe hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine, drugs recom… [+6399 chars]
